title: Experiment in romance
creator_credit: Robert Sdraulig and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Clive, an insulated academic, gets a taste of “La Dolce Vita”. What happens subsequently is limited only by his imagination. Cast includes: Marie-Louise Walker, James Reyne and John Howard. Camera by Michael Bladen.
